data.content: Conclusion: Accumulative Attack. The online training phase exhibits a hallmark monotonic degradation (−47.6 pp accuracy; loss ×7.5) prior to any trigger, followed by a trigger-induced collapse of −13.32 pp (loss ×2.2). This post-trigger drop lies within the reported 95% CI for accumulative PGD-Linf momentum settings and is far larger than clean-trigger or non-accumulative baselines. The pattern definitively rules out No Attack (clean), Label Flipping (lacks trigger differential and shows different drift dynamics), and Brainwash (would drive accuracy to near-random pre-trigger without needing a trigger). Attack confirmed: Accumulative online poisoning with a PGD-Linf-style trigger, with severe collapse after trigger.

The online training phase exhibits a hallmark monotonic degradation (−47.6 pp accuracy; loss ×7.5) prior to any trigger, followed by a trigger-induced collapse of −13.32 pp (loss ×2.2). This post-trigger drop lies within the reported 95% CI for accumulative PGD-Linf momentum settings and is far larger than clean-trigger or non-accumulative baselines. The pattern definitively rules out No Attack (clean), Label Flipping (lacks trigger differential and shows different drift dynamics), and Brainwash (would drive accuracy to near-random pre-trigger without needing a trigger). Attack confirmed: Accumulative online poisoning with a PGD-Linf-style trigger, with severe collapse after trigger."}

Attack type: Accumulative Attack. The final evaluation step did not execute due to a missing checkpoint, so no new metrics were produced. The prior online phase already demonstrated the definitive accumulative poisoning signature (large pre-trigger degradation and a further post-trigger collapse), ruling out clean, label flipping, and brainwash. Conclusion remains Accumulative Attack. To complete final evaluation, restore or regenerate checkpoints_base2/epoch40.pth and rerun to log before/after-trigger accuracy and ASR.

Conclusion remains Accumulative Attack. To complete final evaluation, restore or regenerate checkpoints_base2/epoch40.pth and rerun to log before/after-trigger accuracy and ASR."}
